DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess diagnostic accuracy combine use non-invasive coronary angiography multi-slice compute tomography ( MSCT ) stress cardiac magnetic resonance ( CMR ) image patient obstructive lesion MSCT low intermediate pre-test likelihood coronary artery disease ( CAD ) compare invasive coronary angiography ( CAG ) Fractional Flow Reserve ( FFR ) measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Non-invasive Invasive Assessment Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients stable angina pectoris low intermediate pretest likelihood CAD ; 2. previous history CAD ; 3. obstructive stenosis ( â‰¥50 % luminal narrowing ) MSCT coronary angiography ; 4.informed consent . 1. patient previous history CAD ; 2. patient contraindication MSCT : a.cardiac rhythm sinus rhythm , b.pregnancy , c.allergy contrast medium , d.renal failure ( estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 50ml/min ) , e.resting heart rate > 75 bpm plus contraindication betablockade , f. weight > 100 kilogram ; 3. contraindication cardiac magnetic resonance ( CMR ) imaging : a.MRincompatible implant , b. Claustrophobia , c. contraindication adenosine : i. know suspected hypersensitivity adenosine , ii . know suspected bronchoconstrictive bronchospastic disease , iii . 2nd 3rd degree atrioventricular ( AV ) block , iv . Sinus bradycardia ( heart rate < 45 bpm ) , v. Systemic arterial hypotension ( < 90 mmHg ) . d. contraindication gadolinium : i. renal failure ( estimate eGFR < 30 ml/min ) ; 4. informed consent .
